product_name: MilaniMake It Last Original - Natural Finish Setting Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilani Make It Last Original - Natural Finish Setting Spray is makeup locking magic that hydrates and sets your look with a flawless natural finish for up to 24 hours.
details: DetailsFeaturesMultitasking formula primes, hydrates & sets makeup for up to 24 hoursSkin loving formula made with ultra-hydrating Glycerin and active levels of antioxidant-rich NiacinamideWaterproof & sweatproof formulaHelps prevent makeup from fading and settling into creasesVeganMade in USABenefitsCan be used before makeup to prime or after makeup to setEnjoy up to 24 hours without a crease or smudge in sightItem 2519996How To UseHold bottle 8-10 inches away from face and spray in zigzag formation. Do not spray directly into eyes.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Alcohol Denat., Niacinamide, PVP, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Poloxamer 407, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract, Fragrance (Parfum), Citrullus Lanathus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Citrulline, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol, BHT, Potassium Sorbate, Benzyl Salicylate.
how_to_use: Hold bottle 8-10 inches away from face and spray in zigzag formation. Do not spray directly into eyes.

reviews.headline: Separates makeup :(
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this because of the great reviews and affordable price, but it made my makeup separate badly. I tried it with different foundations, CC creams, and skin tints, and it still separated. Maybe it's just my skin type, but unfortunately I'll be returning it.

reviews.headline: Sticks!!!
reviews.comments: I use this in after using cream/wet products, set my oily areas with bare minerals setting powder, used milani setting spray, and used a little bit of the one size setting spray and my makeup last during the day in the texas heatü´¶. went to touch my face bc i felt like i was sweatinbut makeup didnt budge at all. i also fell asleep in it and there was no makeup on the pillows while the makeup stayed intact!GET ASAP

reviews.headline: Pass
reviews.comments: This setting spray does not last. I used to use UD setting spray but decided to try this because the other one has a horrible smell. This setting spray caused my makeup to separate after 3 hours. I saw videos saying to apply it immediately after skin care and then apply a final coat after completing makeup. Unfortunately, this technique didn't work either. I will keep looking for my holy grail.

reviews.headline: My everyday spray
reviews.comments: Not sure if it makes my makeup stay longer but I use it after my makeup cause it melts my makeup and makes it look better. I saw reviews that it makes face oily and I do notcie my makeup getting oily after hours but I havent noticed experimented If the setting spray is the reason why. If it is the reason why then it makes my makeup seperate due to the oiliness .

reviews.headline: I honestly am shocked!
reviews.comments: I am an early childhood teacher in the south. On our first day of school, I prepped my makeup like I usually and sprayed this Make It Last to set. I am not joking when I say my makeup DID. NOT. MOVE. My foundation settled, but the coverage was exactly as when I walked out the door. I had outside bus duty in 90* temps, sweating profusely. I figured I was out of luck when I walked back in to school. Y'all. My makeup was PERFECT. I will be exclusively this from here on out.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Stays on for a while and feels like my makeup isn't even there. When I first put it on it's really refreshing.  It wasn't very expensive and very easy to use. Like whenever I spray it, it doesn't just go in one spot the spay has a very wide range and is perfect for anything.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: ive bought this like three times already and i love it! (tip: use it before applying makeup, let is dry, do makeup, and then use it after.)

reviews.headline: Keeps makeup in place and fresh
reviews.comments: This product is amazing at keeping makeup on throughout the day. My biggest issue is my mascara tends to collect under my eyes but I don't like waterproof so I have been trying to find an affordable setting spray that keeps my makeup in tact. So far this setting spray has been great, I do notice after about 6-7 hours my mascara does find its way under my eyes but it's nothing like it looks if I dont use a setting spray. I love the natural dewy finish of this setting spray as well, I have dry acne prone skin and this does wonders for keeping my makeup glowy and it does not bother my acne at all. I don't wear a lot of makeup, mainly concealer and blush, and usually by the end of the day both have disappeared but with this spray I still look like I'm wearing makeup and I am very happy with that!

reviews.headline: Just get it
reviews.comments: I was first impressed with the super clean smell applying, its not really fragranced just feels clean on your skin. I didn't really think about it through the rest of the day, but just woke up from a really hot nap, and my makeup looked great. Pores looking tight. No budge in my coverage.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: Love the product

reviews.headline: Milani setting spray
reviews.comments: Its a good product however, i cant tell much of a difference when using it. It also has a little bit of scent to it, which im not much of a fan on.

reviews.headline: Why is there fragrance in this.
reviews.comments: Any peoduct with added fragrance is going to cause acne and irritation to people with sensitive/acne prone skin. No one needs to perfume their face

reviews.headline: Not for the oily girls üíî
reviews.comments: I really wanted to like this, but it just made me so unbelievably oily, my makeup was mike sliding off my face. When I sprayed it on, it just felt so sticky, itchy, and heavy on my face. Although I will never use this again, I will say, it made my makeup look so airbrushed and skin-like, and I haven't found anything that made my makeup look that good since. So maybe a good product if you have dry skin???

reviews.headline: Really great affordable setting spray
reviews.comments: I love this setting spray and it's great for the price! I feel like the mist is very fine and it helps blend my makeup together beautifully and helps it's longevity. I love to pair this with a fixing spray. I wouldn't say it makes makeup waterproof or sweatproof, but it can be helpful. Doesn't make the skin too dewy or matte.

reviews.headline: Works good
reviews.comments: Keeps makeup on for hours

reviews.headline: Milani setting sprau
reviews.comments: Good setting spray

reviews.headline: I wanted to love this SO BAD
reviews.comments: This setting spray seemed like a dream. It felt super lightweight, didnt clog my pores up, and made my makeup look seriously airbrushed, and you cannot beat that price!‚Ä¶ and then it started to rain. THE MOMENT water touched it it was gone and would take all my makeup with it. Never had this problem with a setting spray before. Guess i'm going to back to Urban Decay.

reviews.headline: Wanted to love‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: I have tried this product multiple times, and no matter how I try to use it‚Äîall my makeup just swipes off instantly.

reviews.headline: Not sweat proof
reviews.comments: I love this product but sadly it failed me on a hot New Orleans day.  This spray is not sweat proof :-( .. My make up was gone by the end of brunch so embarrassing!!!

reviews.headline: I love this so much!!
reviews.comments: I was using a bad setting spray before this and this one redeemed my makeup. I accidentally broke the sprayer dropping it so be careful! I highly recommened this

media.headline: Better than Urban Decay All-Nighter Spray
media.caption: 10 hours into my makeup after spending at least half of it outside on a hot Florida day

media.headline: Dupe for Urban Decay All nighter

faceoff_positive.comments: Great product. Setting spray did the job in the toughest of conditions. I had just taken a shower in hot water and all the steam and heat was present in the bathroom. I had than blowed dried my hair and flat ironed it on the highest setting in the same space without opening a door or window as it was cold outside and the heat was on. I however do not tolerate heat well and in turn sweat profusely and after applying my makeup in the past sweating would always be a problem for me. With my makeup smearing and streaking from the beads of sweat. After applying my makeup this time I used the setting spray as directed and no evidence of streaking or smearing was visible. I am very happy with this product and recommend it! The price is right and the product is great! What more do you need?
faceoff_positive.headline: Love the setting spray!

faceoff_negative.comments: This product smells amazing, however I have been using it for about a month now and have put the cap on everyday. Now there is white fuzzy mold in the cap and on the nozzle. I would recommend taking the lid of the bottle off after using, so mold doesn't start growing.
faceoff_negative.headline: would not recommend putting the cap on after using

rollup.name: Make It Last Original - Natural Finish Setting Spray
